ch.aplu.android
Class GGOrientationSensor

java.lang.Object
  ch.aplu.android.GGOrientationSensor

public class GGOrientationSensor
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton abstraction of the hardware orientation sensor.

Method Summary
static GGOrientationSensor create(android.app.Activity activity)
          Returns a GGOrientationSensor for the given activity.
 int getAzimuth()
          Returns the current azimuth (angle from north, clockwise positive).
 int getPitch()
          Returns the current pitch (forward tilt angle).
 int getRoll()
          Returns the current roll (left tilt angle).
 int getWorldPitch()
          Returns the current pitch independent of the device orientation.
 int getWorldRoll()
          Returns the current roll independent of the device orientation.

Method Detail

create

public static GGOrientationSensor create(android.app.Activity activity)
Returns a GGOrientationSensor for the given activity.

Parameters:
activity - the activity used for the hardware access
Returns:
a new GGOrientationSensor reference or the current, if already created for the same activity

getAzimuth

public int getAzimuth()
Returns the current azimuth (angle from north, clockwise positive).

Returns:
the mesured azimuth (in degrees 0..360)

getPitch

public int getPitch()
Returns the current pitch (forward tilt angle).

Returns:
the mesured pitch angle (in degrees)

getRoll

public int getRoll()
Returns the current roll (left tilt angle).

Returns:
the mesured roll angle (in degrees)

getWorldPitch

public int getWorldPitch()
Returns the current pitch independent of the device orientation.

Returns:
the mesured world coordinate pitch angle (in degrees)

getWorldRoll

public int getWorldRoll()
Returns the current roll independent of the device orientation.

Returns:
the mesured world coordinate roll angle (in degrees)
